item.title: Argo Workflow 5
item.description: Argo Workflow (5) 1 Loops When writing workflows, it is often useful to iterate over a set of inputs. This is how Argo Workflows handle looping. There are three basic ways to run a template multiple times: withSequence iterates over a sequence of numbers. withItems accepts a list of items to process, which can be: Plain single values, accessible via {{item}} in the template. JSON objects, where each element can be referenced by its key as {{item.
